DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine safety MDV3100 give combination Docetaxel men advance prostate cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Tolerability Study MDV3100 Combination With Docetaxel Men With Advanced Prostate Cancer
DOC.criteria: Willing able provide inform consent ; Men , 18 year age old ; Histologically cytologically confirm adenocarcinoma prostate ; Ongoing androgen deprivation therapy Severe concurrent disease ; Known suspect brain metastasis ; History another malignancy within previous 5 year ; Prior treatment docetaxelbased chemotherapy
